mapper.update: UPDATE wxArticle SET deleteflag = 1 WHERE YEAR(lastDate)=#{year} AND MONTH(lastDate)=#{month} AND wxBiz = #{wxBiz}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM wxArticle WHERE YEAR(lastDate)=#{year} AND MONTH(lastDate)=#{month} AND wxBiz = #{wxBiz}
mapper.select: SELECT openid,wxBiz,`hour`,groupName,CAST(title AS CHAR CHARACTER SET utf8) as title,url,`date`,publishTime,author,readNum,likeNum,headLineNum,isOriginal,articleId,wxName,lastDate,wxHeadPicture) WHERE YEAR(latestDate)=#{year} AND MONTH(latestDate) =#{month} AND wxBiz =#{wxBiz}
